title: Henri – Restaurant Management
shortDescription: Henri is a full-stack Restaurant Management Website designed to offer a seamless and engaging experience for customers while empowering staff with efficient management tools. Built with the MERN stack, this platform allows users to explore food items, place orders, manage their own contributions, and interact with the system through a responsive and intuitive user interface.
features: Food Management (CRUD): Users can add, view, update, and delete their own food items
Food Ordering System with quantity checks and owner restrictions
Order History: Users can view and delete their past orders

title: Free.io – Freelance Task Marketplace
shortDescription: Free.io is a full-stack freelance task marketplace. It allows users to post tasks, bid on freelance work, and interact through comments and task updates. The platform emphasizes real-world functionality with protected routes, authentication, responsive UI, and a smooth user experience.
features: Task Bidding System with bidsCount tracking

title: Zentrys – Metagame Layer Demo
shortDescription: Zentrys is a demo website showcasing the concept of a unified metagame layer integrating AI, blockchain, and gaming. It presents core features such as token economy, agentic AI, and cross-platform engagement with a modern and responsive UI.
features: Unified gaming ecosystem demo integrating Web2 & Web3
Token economy visualization and interactive UI
